faqs.question: What file formats are supported by the Avatar Toolkit?
faqs.answer:
The Avatar Toolkit supports multiple file formats for importing. Some formats may require additional third-party plugins.

### Fully Supported Formats
- FBX
- SMD
- GLTF
- GLB
- GC
- OBJ
- DAE
- 3DS
- STL
- MTL
- x3D
- WRL
- VMD
- VRM (requires plugin)
- animx

[note]Some formats like VRM require additional plugins to function.[/note]

[warning]PMX and PMD was removed in Alpha 2 (0.2.0) because the importers were not working fully, we are going back to the drawing board and PMX and PMD support will be released in Alpha 3.[/warning]

history.changes: Updated Formats to remove PMX and PMD
